'''1.4.5''' is a minor update to the [[launcher]] released on May 19, 2014.

== Changes ==
* Added a "Switch users" button to make switching users easier
* Attempt to fix [[bugtracker:MCL-2444|MCL-2444]], but the fix didn't work.
* Another attempt to fix [[bugtracker:MCL-2494|MCL-2494]], but the fix didn't work.
